/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall serene ambiance of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
